hero.title: Partnerships & Sponsorships
hero.subtitle: Looking to collaborate with an automotive influencer who connects with over 290k followers across platforms? Let's work together to create engaging sponsored content that resonates with car enthusiasts worldwide.

items.title: Welding Tools Showcase
items.description: Demonstrated the functionality and benefits of premium welding equipment through a series of tutorial videos.

items.title: Performance Parts Review
items.description: Comprehensive testing and installation of aftermarket performance parts with before/after results.

items.title: Budget vs. Premium Tools
items.description: Side-by-side comparison of budget-friendly and professional-grade automotive tools to help viewers make informed decisions.

items.title: Turbo Build Series
items.description: A comprehensive multi-part series showcasing the complete process of turbocharging a naturally aspirated engine. Perfect for tool and parts sponsorships.

items.title: Caveman's Garage Overhaul
items.description: Complete workshop transformation featuring storage solutions, tool organization, and workspace upgrades. Ideal for tool brands and garage equipment.

items.title: Budget Restoration Challenge
items.description: Restoring a classic vehicle on a tight budget, showcasing affordable products and creative solutions. Great for parts, tools, and cleaning product promotions.

rateCard.title: Partnership Rates
rateCard.introText: Rates vary based on the scope, platform, and deliverables required. Below are starting rates for standard promotional content:

contactCTA.title: Ready to Collaborate?
contactCTA.description: Let's create automotive content that drives engagement and showcases your products to an audience of passionate car enthusiasts. Contact me today to discuss how we can work together.
